name: KUYLLUR No. 5 - PIRWA
description: uyllur is kechwa for star or heavenly body. This series of collectible reflections are meant to call our attention back to the daily cycle within the week. One kuyllur for each day of the week. A minute-long meditation to tune in with the unique energy of each day, which we can feel. Pirwa is day 5, also known as Thursday. Artist is Espinosa on Twitter @spnsmtndsgn Lossless files (and other perks) available for collectors. 1080p24fps
